tool_description: The Betigolo Predictions API is a powerful tool that provides probability estimates for various sports events, such as football, basketball, and baseball. It can be used for sports betting with EV+ to help users make informed decisions about their bets. The API is easy to use and can be integrated into sports betting applications with the help of detailed documentation and code examples provided by Rapid API. With the Betigolo Predictions API, users can access accurate and up-to-date probabil...
title: Betigolo Predictions

api_list.name: Handball predictions by day
api_list.description: Get a list of all matches for a specific day, including predictions for many markets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betigolo-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/handball/{day}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betigolo-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sample predictions
api_list.description: Get a list of a sample of matches of the previous day, including predictions for many markets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betigolo-predictions.p.rapidapi.com/sample"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betigolo-predictions.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.league_name: Brazil Copa do Nordeste Qualifying Round 2

match_dat.description: Unix timestamp of the match start time

rank_htw_ft.description: Probability of the home team to win at full time

rank_drw_ft.description: Probability of a draw at full time

rank_atw_ft.description: Probability of the away team to win at full time

rank_hhc_p15_ft.description: Probability of the home team to win with handicap +1.5 at full time

rank_ahc_p15_ft.description: Probability of the away team to win with handicap +1.5 at full time

rank_to_05_ft.description: Probability of total goals at full time to be over 0.5

rank_to_15_ft.description: Probability of total goals at full time to be over 1.5

rank_to_25_ft.description: Probability of total goals at full time to be over 2.5

rank_to_35_ft.description: Probability of total goals at full time to be over 3.5

rank_btts_ft.description: Probability of both teams to score at full time

rank_ho_05_ft.description: Probability of home team goals at full time to be over 0.5

rank_ho_15_ft.description: Probability of home team goals at full time to be over 1.5

rank_ao_05_ft.description: Probability of away team goals at full time to be over 0.5

rank_ao_15_ft.description: Probability of away team goals at full time to be over 1.5

rank_htw_ht.description: Probability of the home team to win at half time

rank_drw_ht.description: Probability of a draw at half time

rank_atw_ht.description: Probability of the away team to win at half time

rank_to_05_ht.description: Probability of total goals at half time to be over 0.5

rank_to_15_ht.description: Probability of total goals at half time to be over 1.5

rank_to_25_ht.description: Probability of total goals at half time to be over 2.5

rank_btts_ht.description: Probability of both teams to score at half time

rank_ho_05_ht.description: Probability of home team goals at half time to be over 0.5

rank_ho_15_ht.description: Probability of home team goals at half time to be over 1.5

rank_ao_05_ht.description: Probability of away team goals at half time to be over 0.5

rank_ao_15_ht.description: Probability of away team goals at half time to be over 1.5
